triggers.description: Critical Hit with Attacks inflict Bleed for 2 seconds. Bleed damage is 50% of Physical Damage dealt by initial Hit per second.
Taking a hit grants +20% Attack Speed for 2s and stacks +30% Attack Damage for 2s.
Attack Hits apply a stack of Open Wound for 5s. Each stack deals 20% of the initial hit's Physical Damage when the target is Hit by an Attack.

Trigger.description: Open Wound takes additional Physical Damage when Hit by an Attack.

triggers.description: Fire Hits have 30% Chance to apply a stacking Burn for 2s, dealing 50% of the Hit's Fire Damage per second. Critical Hits always Burn.
Damage over Time effects spread to nearby enemies on Kill, for their remaining Duration.
